question: Some parts of the Chotanagpur plateau has a type of flat-topped tableland. It is locally known as by which of the following name?
explanation: The flat-topped table land type part of the Chotanagpur plateau is locally known as Pat or Patland. It is mainly found in the western side of the Ranchi plateau. Some of the patlands are Netarhat Pat, Jamira Pat, Khamar Pat etc.
